title: Attri - Get a Second Brain with Generative AI
description: Attri is your second brain in the cloud, designed to easily store and retrieve unstructured information.
two_brains_title: Two brains is better than one
two_brains_desc: Attri is your second brain in the cloud, designed to easily store and retrieve unstructured information.
any_kind_of_data_desc: Attri can handle almost any type of data you throw at it. Text, images, code snippets, we've got you covered.
fast_and_accurate_title: Get a Fast and Consistent Brain
fast_and_accurate_desc: Attri is your second brain in the cloud, designed to easily store and retrieve unstructured information.
fast_and_efficient_desc: Designed with speed and efficiency at its core. Attri ensures rapid access to your data.
open_source_desc: Freedom is beautiful, so is Attri. Open source and free to use.
